title: Blended Teaching Method Design for Strengthening Mathematics Teaching Competencies in Vocational Colleges

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience in basic data analysis in the workplace
context.additional_context: Program to improve practical mathematics pedagogy for working adult learners.

learning_goals: Improved learner engagement by over 25% through the application of a mixed-methods research approach.
Development of three or more assessment tools designed with a student-centered approach.
Acquisition of the ability to design lessons utilizing smartphone-based digital resources.
Development and application of ten or more practical case-linked mathematics problems.
Establishment of classroom environment improvement strategies to enhance learner-instructor interaction.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
